title: 86. Client Coaching + Communication Workshop.
description:
In this episode, I want to talk about the art and psychology of communication, and why it matters for our aesthetics businesses. I share tips for communication when it comes to written, verbal, and non-verbal cues! Let me know which ones resonate with you on social media. ☺️

This episode is sponsored by Gloss Genius. 

  • Use promo code: TTR22S 
  • Link: https://glossgenius.biz/TTR22S-signup
  • Offer: 50% off for 2 months 

MY SOCIAL MEDIA + SHOPS 

Book a skin consultation or mentorship call with me: www.tessaskin.com
